metadata.synopsis: Character is caged for this entire dialogue If the player saves the goblin captive from being killed, the goblin will try to convince the player to free them and then meet the player later in the goblin camp.

1.speaker: Sazza
1.text: We're runnin' out of time. They're gonna murder me!
1.context: NodeContext: spoken when player tampers with her cage while she's locked up - curious

14.speaker: Sazza
14.text: Wotcher messin' with my cage for?
14.context: NodeContext: spoken when player tampers with her cage while she's locked up - curious

103.speaker: Sazza
103.text: Didn't expect to see a drow in here. Did the boss lady send you to rescue me?

80.speaker: Sazza
80.text: Another drow - she's one of my best mates. Thought you might work for her.

79.speaker: Sazza
79.text: You're not mates with the tiefs, are you? You need to get back to your own people before you go soft.

62.speaker: Sazza
62.text: The lady that sent me here's the cruellest drow I ever met. You could learn a thing or two from her.

28.speaker: Sazza
28.text: Get me outta here, and I'll take you to meet her and the rest of my tribe.

73.speaker: Player
73.text: Yes, she sent me. Ready to get out of here?

33.speaker: Player
33.text: Yes, she sent me. Ready to get out of here?

65.speaker: Sazza
65.text: Yeah. Take me back to the tribe, and we'll tell the boss all about this pretty little place so she can burn it to the ground.

47.speaker: Sazza
47.text: Yeah. Take me back to the tribe, and we'll tell the boss all about this pretty little place so she can burn it to the ground.

22.speaker: Sazza
22.text: We'll be heroes, blessed by Priestess Gut in the name of the Absolute.

76.text: Don't believe you. There's something a bit soft about you.

4.speaker: Sazza
4.text: Don't believe you. You ain't got enough scars to be one of her playthings.

38.speaker: Sazza
38.text: Yer a long way from 'ome, ain't ya, underdwarf?

39.speaker: Sazza
39.text: Get me outta 'ere, an' I'll introduce you to my tribe. You'd like 'em.

42.speaker: Player
42.text: Well, if you make it worth my while...

99.speaker: Player
99.text: Goblins belong in cages. You won't be getting my help.

90.speaker: Sazza
90.text: Aw, c'mon. We could be mates.

13.speaker: Player
13.text: Patience. I'll get you out soon.

10.speaker: Sazza
10.text: I been patient. So hurry it up, yeah?

84.speaker: Player
84.text: What could a tribe of goblins possibly offer me?

63.speaker: Sazza
63.text: The power of the Absolute, of course! Priestess Gut will tell you all about it and make sure you have everything you need.

16.speaker: Sazza
16.text: The Absolute is gold from the sky, She is. The blessin' in the storm an' the storm itself.

87.speaker: Sazza
87.text: We're burnin' Her name across the face o' the world, we are.

37.speaker: Player
37.text: Priestess Gut is quite the name. Tell me more.

19.speaker: Sazza
19.text: I already met your friend. You here to get me out of here?

20.speaker: Sazza
20.text: Yer a long way from 'ome, ain't ya, underdwarf?

27.speaker: Sazza
27.text: You gonna open this cage or wot?

30.speaker: Sazza
30.text: Didn't expect to see a drow in here. Did the boss lady send you to rescue me?

61.speaker: Sazza
61.text: Ain't sure why ya protected me. Don't care, neither.

59.speaker: Sazza
59.text: It's too late to make friends, worgmeat. My tribe's comin'.

5.speaker: Sazza
5.text: They're gonna burn this pretty place for the glory of the Absolute and 'ang ya by yer guts.

2.speaker: Player
2.text: I just saved your life. Show some gratitude.

7.speaker: Sazza
7.text: They'll peel yer face off and nail it to a wall!

56.speaker: Sazza
56.text: I ain't scared of some guard. Stick a dozen arrows in me, and Priestess Gut'd still patch me up.

25.speaker: Player
25.text: They can try, but they won't be the first goblins I've killed today.

35.speaker: Sazza
35.text: We got more than ya can handle. And our priestess keeps us fightin' even if someone sticks a few holes in us.

92.speaker: Player
92.text: Who is this Absolute you're so fond of? Your god?

98.speaker: Sazza
98.text: They're gonna burn this pretty place for the glory of the Absolute and 'ang ya by yer guts.

41.speaker: Player
41.text: Ah, the 'Absolute'. This is the deity you're bowing to?

0.speaker: Player
0.text: The Absolute? Can't say I know your god.

70.speaker: Sazza
70.text: We're burnin' Her name across the face o' the world, we are.
70.context: NodeContext: speaking of her god - the Absolute - awe.

24.speaker: Sazza
24.text: The Absolute is gold from the sky, She is. The blessin' in the storm an' the storm itself.
24.context: NodeContext: speaking of her god - the Absolute - awe.

9.speaker: Player
9.text: You've caught my interest. Have any holy literature on you?
9.context: NodeContext: Very arrogant - extremely pleased that a goblin has been chosen to be blessed

75.speaker: Sazza
75.text: My tribe can tell you everythin' there is to know. Absolute blessed one of our own - Priestess Gut.
75.context: NodeContext: Very arrogant - extremely pleased that a goblin has been chosen to be blessed

6.speaker: Sazza
6.text: Got a whole lab set up. Cooks up potions that fix our lads no matter how much of a beatin' they take.

82.speaker: Sazza
82.text: Could probably stick yer head back on if someone woz to chop it off. Mighty booyahg.

78.speaker: Player
78.text: Bah. A clever goblin's like a trustworthy ghaik: a figment of the imagination.
78.context: NodeContext: Half muttered to his companion. Emphasis on 'very'

83.speaker: Lae'zel
83.text: Bah. A clever goblin's like a trustworthy ghaik: a figment of the imagination.
83.context: NodeContext: Half muttered to his companion. Emphasis on 'very'

66.speaker: Shadowheart
66.text: A goblin healer. We really are desperate, aren't we?
66.context: NodeContext: Half muttered to his companion. Emphasis on 'very'

100.speaker: Karlach
100.text: I wonder how she feels about trepanning.
100.context: NodeContext: Half muttered to his companion. Emphasis on 'very'

34.speaker: Astarion
34.text: I'm not saying we should trust a goblin, but she sounds very useful.
34.context: NodeContext: Half muttered to his companion. Emphasis on 'very'

3.speaker: Player
3.text: Well, I'd certainly like to meet her.
3.context: NodeContext: Thinks she's offering a GREAT deal

86.speaker: Player
86.text: Well, I'd certainly like to meet her.
86.context: NodeContext: Thinks she's offering a GREAT deal

95.speaker: Sazza
95.text: Get me out of 'ere and I'll tell you where to find 'er. Deal?
95.context: NodeContext: Thinks she's offering a GREAT deal

57.speaker: Player
57.text: Deal. I'll get you out of there.

85.speaker: Sazza
85.text: Then hurry up an' do it. My tribe ain't as friendly as I am.

58.speaker: Player
58.text: You already told me what I need to know. I'll find the priestess myself.

52.speaker: Sazza
52.text: Ha! Even if you did find my tribe, they'd set the worgs on ya.

32.speaker: Sazza
32.text: You need me - get me outta here, and I'll tell 'em what a good friend you are.
32.context: NodeContext: heavy emphasis on 'need' - she's convinced she's winning us over

43.speaker: Player
43.text: Not a chance. You can rot in that cage.

12.speaker: Sazza
12.text: Suit yerself. Lookin' forward to seein' wot yer innards look like.

49.speaker: Player
49.text: Just be patient. I'll break you free soon enough.

29.speaker: Sazza
29.text: Well, 'urry up. I got all the time in the world. You don't.

69.speaker: Player
69.text: Actions have consequences, Sazza. Maybe use this time in the cage to reflect.

54.speaker: Player
54.text: Nice story. Buy it for a copper in a tavern nearby?
54.context: NodeContext: as if swearing a solemn oath

72.speaker: Sazza
72.text: It's the truth - I swear on your mother's grave.
72.context: NodeContext: as if swearing a solemn oath

45.speaker: Wyll
45.text: I'd sooner swig a flask of acid than anything a goblin cooks up.

50.speaker: Gale
50.text: Booyahg - the goblin word for magic. Primitive to a fault, but not entirely without merit.

77.speaker: Player
77.text: An all-powerful goddess that can't get you out of a cage?

18.speaker: Sazza
18.text: Maybe She sent you to help me. An' ya will, if ya wanna save yer skin.

68.speaker: Sazza
68.text: And if the tiefs stick a few arrows in us on the way out of here, don't worry. Priestess Gut'll patch us up.

64.speaker: Sazza
64.text: Runnin' out of time, worgmeat. My family'll be 'ere soon. Lemme out.

71.speaker: Sazza
71.text: Ain't sure why ya killed that soft-arse to protect me. Don't care, neither.

97.speaker: Sazza
97.text: Oh, look - one of ya found the stones to talk to me rather than cryin' an' moanin' about yer dead mates.

104.speaker: Sazza
104.text: No point turnin' on yer own if yer just gonna give 'em a little tap.
